name: Red Riding Wolf
description:
You must escape from the forest and avoid every obstacle!
Switch between a little girl and a monstruous werewolf to complete the level!
Go with the flow of the music pressing R and L on time!
This game was made for the MalagaJam Weekend 13, by:
Rubén Triviño
Dani Zattara
Elisa Fortes
Rafael Larrosa
